// create roles:
//admin
curl -i -X POST http://localhost:5000/roles -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"value": "ADMIN", "description": "main user"}'
//user
curl -i -X POST http://localhost:5000/roles -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"value": "USER", "description": "regular user"}'

// sign-up
curl -i -X POST http://localhost:5000/auth/signup -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"email": "ozov8@ukr.net", "password": "1234567", "first_name": "john", "last_name": "smith"}'

// sign-in
curl -i -X POST http://localhost:5000/auth/signin -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"email": "ozov@ukr.net", "password": "1234567"}'

// activate
curl -i -X GET http://localhost:5000/auth/activate/f1bcbc60-115e-4144-9292-17180f193050

// sign-out
curl -i -X POST http://localhost:5000/auth/signout -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"email": "ozov@ukr.net", "password": "1234567"}' -b "refreshToken=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..uq0HzV"
